name: Dashjobs
text: MEAN stack app used to help organize an individuals job search activities. You have several different options once importing a job. Several fields help you keep track of where you are in the process.

name: Plopjs
text: 1st group project for Code Fellows 401 JS course. This app produces cloud-based storage of organization level boilerplate intended to simplify companies project development by allowing for customizable templates to be generated, stored, and shared repeatedly.

name: YouChoose
text: This was a group project for a Code Fellows 301 course that involved the importing content from the Youtube API, the google oauth2 sign in method and local storage. This was a great experience in rapid prototyping while incorporating new technologies. The API calls were new to the team. We also incorporated client side routing and local storage into the project.

name: BeerNuts
text: Beer information page with recommendations for local Seattle brew pubs and a beer style selector with an associated triva game.

name: Cookie-Stand
text: First app using a constructor and form data that was built during an 201 level javascript course. Pat loves making salmon cookies. Are they salmon flavored or salmon shaped? We may never know

name: BusMall
text: Product survey app built to get user preferences over a series of photos with results displayed using Chart.js
